definitions.title: vb. divide
definitions.body: (NH id., divide, separate; so Syr. in der. spec. and deriv.; Ar. farada be single, sole, also (Dozy) unfold, unroll):—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. fpl. [[פְּרֻדוֹת]] Ez Eze 1:11 divided, i.e. spread, of wings.

divide, separate (intrans.), Ge 2:10 (of river, dividing into branches); of one man separating from another, c. [[מֵעַל]] Ge 13:9, Ge 13:11, [[מֵעִם]] v:Ge 13:14 (all J), from others, [[מִן]] Ju Jdg 4:11; recipr. Ge 25:23 (J; of sons of Rebekah representing nations, c. [[מִמֵּעַיִח]] in constr. praegn. [Ges:§ 199 ff], i.e. divided (hostile) from birth); abs. Pr 18:1; of peoples separating from ([[מִן]]) parent stock Pr 10:5, Pr 10:32 (P).
be divided, separated, 2Sa 1:23, Ne 4:13; of loss of friendship Pr 19:4.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְפָרֵָדוּ]] Ho 4:14 make a separation, i.e. go apart (in company with [[[עִם]]] harlots, cf. RS:Sem. i. 436, 2nd ed. 455).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. divided, [[מְפֻזׇּר וּמְפׂרָד בֵּין הָעַמִּים]]…[[עַם]] Es 3:8
divide, separate Ge 30:40 (JE) De 32:8, of separating friends Pr 16:28, Pr 17:9.
make a division, separation, between ([[בֵּין]]), 2Ki 2:11, Ru 1:17; of parting disputants (c. [[בֵּין]]) Pr 18:18.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וְהִתְפָּֽרְדוּ]] Ps 22:15; Impf. [[יִתְפָּֽרְדוּ]] Ps 92:10, [[רָָדוּ]]- Job 4:11, Job 41:9; —be divided, separated, from each other; of scales of crocodile (c. neg.) Job 41:9, of bones, = be loosened at the joint, Ps 22:15 (fig. of helplessness); = be dispersed Job 4:11, Ps 92:10.
